content.title: Free Education For Sports Medal Winners / Participants Of National/ International Events
content.beneficiary: Sports Medal Winners / Participants of National/ International Events
content.details: The scheme aims to provide financial assistance to medal winners and elite sports persons studying in universities/colleges for full-time regular courses, including PG Diploma and other professional courses. It motivates sports persons to achieve higher performance levels by assisting them financially in education and sports development.
benefits: Tuition Fee and Other Funds for various degrees
eligibility: Participants in recognized international sporting events recognized by the World University Service, International Olympic Committee, and Olympic Committee of Asia (OCA)
exclusions: Termination by the Commission on recommendation of the University
content.application_process: Online application through the UGC portal. A certificate of participation/medal winner must be submitted as proof.
documents_required: Certificate of participation/medal winner attested by Registrar/Principal
Statement of selected students and their scholarship receipts
Progress Report after the first year

faqs.question: Is There A List Of Documents That Are To Be Submitted By The Candidate Through The University/College?
faqs.answer: Yes, the candidate must submit an application in the prescribed format and a certificate of participation/medal winner.

faqs.question: Can The Applications Also Be Submitted Offline?
faqs.answer: No, applications must be submitted online.

faqs.question: What Is The Eligibility Criteria For This Scheme?
faqs.answer: The scholarship is for medal winners of National games and participants in recognized international sporting events.

faqs.question: What Are The Objectives Of This Scheme?
faqs.answer: To provide financial assistance to medal winners and motivate them to achieve higher performance levels.
